descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][youtube]-rY6Y24Kb-o[/youtube]
Hedda and Kierra Norell[/color][/b] are 2 elventwins.

They are outside at the back of the [color=#ff0000]Companions Hall in Whiterun[/color].

[size=4]To make them follow you, I recommend 1 of these mods:[/size]

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?

Amazing follower tweak

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?

[size=4]required files:[/size]

Pretty Lips textures for the wetlooks on the lips

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1167/?

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

SG Hairpack

http://pan.baidu.com/wap/link?uk=3574985185&shareid=2204221951&third=0

[color=#000000][size=3]credits to:[/size][/color]

NannyOggins for making this mod for me

Endorse if you like plz

Also, feel free to post some of your screenshots here
author: Osiris Dragonia
